alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 9:49PM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Local accumulations up to 6 inches possible under heavier snow bands. * WHERE...Southern El Paso County including Colorado Springs * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
